holidays.title: National Hoagie Day
holidays.description: Head to the deli for a hoagie. Or a sub. Or a grinder. Or a hero.

holidays.title: National Lemonade Day
holidays.description: Meet people, sip on a refreshing beverage and put your money to a good cause.

holidays.title: Bereaved Mother's Day
holidays.description: Let us acknowledge, listen, and find intentional ways to help all grieving mums today.

holidays.title: Children's Day (Kodomo no Hi)
holidays.description: Join us as we celebrate children this Kodomo no Hi on May 5!

holidays.title: Europe Day
holidays.description: On Europe Day, an entire continent celebrates its unity, even in diversity.

holidays.title: Hug a Shed and Take a Selfie Day
holidays.description: From ancient times to the present, man has needed sheds for storage and more.

holidays.title: Indian Arrival Day in Guyana
holidays.description: Guyana celebrates its heritage and motto, “One people, one nation, one destiny.”

holidays.title: International Dawn Chorus Day
holidays.description: Set your alarm clock because you don’t want to miss the morning sounds of these melodious songbirds.

holidays.title: International Midwives Day
holidays.description: Join the global community to appreciate the amazing work of midwives on International Midwives’ Day.

holidays.title: International Permaculture Day
holidays.description: Today we call upon you to play your part in saving the environment.

holidays.title: Liberation Day (Bevrijdingsdag)
holidays.description: Celebrate by learning about the Netherlands’ important WWII history.

holidays.title: Mayday for Mutts
holidays.description: Mayday for Mutts is a national day to spread love and acceptance for mixed breed dogs.

holidays.title: Motorcycle Mass and Blessing of the Bikes Day
holidays.description: Participate in the event and pray for the safe return of every biker on this day.

holidays.title: Museum Lover's Day
holidays.description: Get ready for a very fun day (or night) at the museum!

holidays.title: Nail Day
holidays.description: Get your fake nails ready as we are celebrating a classy and colorful Nail Day.

holidays.title: National Astronaut Day
holidays.description: Do not go gentle into that good night as National Astronaut Day is at hand.

holidays.title: National Cartoonists Day
holidays.description: Read about this day's history, check out five famous cartoons, and much more, right here!

holidays.title: National Concert Day
holidays.description: Let's take part in an event that honors the culture of live musical performances.

holidays.title: National Devin Day
holidays.description: Celebrate the day and appreciate all the Devins all around the world.

holidays.title: National Silence the Shame Day
holidays.description: Speak up for mental health which is as important as physical health for our total well-being.

holidays.title: Orthodox Easter
holidays.description: Get ready to be blown away by the story of this celebration.

holidays.title: Puppy Mill Action Week
holidays.description: Grab your friends and fight to get those furry cuties out of confinement during Puppy Mill Action Week.

holidays.title: Revenge of the 5th
holidays.description: Get your red lightsabers charged and ready to celebrate the Revenge of the Fifth!

holidays.title: Sleep Apnea Awareness Day
holidays.description: Join us as we spread awareness about Sleep Apnoea Awareness Day.

holidays.title: Totally Chipotle Day
holidays.description: Chipotle peppers are a Mexican ingredient that Americans have not just welcomed, but embraced.

holidays.title: World Hand Hygiene Day
holidays.description: Read on about this simple step to fight all the germs and keep you healthy.

holidays.title: World Laughter Day
holidays.description: Make your bonds with people stronger as you laugh together on this day!

holidays.title: World Portuguese Language Day
holidays.description: Let’s learn about one of the most widespread languages in the world — the Portuguese language!

holidays.title: Adele’s Birthday
holidays.description: Adele began to win the hearts of listeners around the world with her live performances.

holidays.title: Don Benjamin’s Birthday
holidays.description: With his good looks and friendly personality, Don Benjamin continues to charm and entertain.

holidays.title: Jenna Davis’s Birthday
holidays.description: With ‘Under The Surface’ (2020), she hit pay dirt when the song went viral.

holidays.title: Karl Marx’s Birthday
holidays.description: A loud critic of capitalism, many of his ideas are the basis of people-friendly policies.

holidays.title: Niki Demartino’s Birthday
holidays.description: This fashion influencer is making waves when it comes to all things style.
